heisigStory: When you draw this character think of linking two walls together, one right side up and the other upside down.
koohiiStory1: The 69 position allows both parties to mutually give themselves pleasure.
koohiiStory2: If you can combined your walls with another house´s walls, both houses would mutually benefit, by the increase in size....
words:
交互(こうご): mutual, reciprocal, alternate
お互い(おたがい): mutual, reciprocal, each other
相互(そうご): mutual, reciprocal
互い(たがい): mutual, reciprocal
